title: WA Robot Search Response
description: Schema for the data field when calling 'wa robot search <query>'. Returns FTS search results.

query.description: The FTS5 query that was executed

total_matches.description: Total number of matches (may exceed returned results if limited)

pane_filter.description: If set, results were filtered to this pane_id

time_filter.description: If set, results were filtered to this time range

after.description: Unix timestamp (ms) - results after this time

before.description: Unix timestamp (ms) - results before this time

search_result.description: A single search result with snippet and metadata

pane_id.description: Pane the segment was captured from

captured_at.description: Unix timestamp (ms) when the segment was captured

snippet.description: Relevant portion of the segment with match highlights (FTS5 snippet)

bm25_score.description: BM25 relevance score (lower is more relevant)
